attributes.action: remove the licence fee from sky subscribers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a sky subscriber i should have the choice to have a package that does not have ANY BBC  channels, it is MY right NOT TO pay for a licence if i wish to not receive BBC signals but I am forced into it, when ITV are having difficult times like now, the BBC don't as we HAVE to pay and fund obscene salaries i.e. Wonathon Woss
